formdata.value: A useful utility app for students
App accesses clipboard and file system

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl --location 'http://127.0.0.1:3302/api/app/create' \
--header 'Authorization: ' \
--form 'description="A useful utility app for students"' \
--form 'category="Education"' \
--form 'email="support@appdomain.com"' \
--form 'phone="+2347012345678"' \
--form 'phone_opt="+2348012345678"' \
--form 'os="Android"' \
--form 'app_icon=@"/path/to/icon.png"' \
--form 'feature_image=@"/path/to/feature.jpg"' \
--form 'policy="We collect no personal data."' \
--form 'app_bundle="com.appdomain.utility"' \
--form 'name_release="UtilityPro"' \
--form 'version="1.2.0"' \
--form 'copyright=" 2025 AppDomain Inc."' \
--form 'release="automatic"' \
--form 'collect_data="yes"' \
--form 'contact_name="John Doe"' \
--form 'contact_email="john@appdomain.com"' \
--form 'contact_phone="+2349098765432"' \
--form 'contact_address="12 App Street, Lagos"' \
--form 'contact_other="Telegram: @AppSupport"' \
--form 'location_precise="GPS required for maps feature"' \
--form 'location_coarse="Used to suggest nearby resources"' \
--form 'sensitive_info="App accesses clipboard and file system"' \
--form 'app_id="APP1234567890"' \
--form 'app_id_name="UtilityProApp"' \
--form 'app_id_prefix="com.appdomain."' \
--form 'app_id_surfix=".utility"' \
--form 'status="pending"' \
--form 'active_date="2025-06-27 09:00:00"' \
--form 'disable_date=""' \
--form 'reject_date=""' \
--form 'comment="Initial submission. Awaiting review."' \
